lines: 1. Nyasachwa man malo,Wuon teko dutoOnge teko moromak tekone adier;Onge ng`ato moromiporo go Nyasaye.En Ruoth ruodhi, beNyasach nyiseche.
2. Hera mar Nyasachwa,Hera adieriEn nooro Yesunikech noherowa;Ne Yesu othonwamondo kik walal ngang`,To wanaherekak` owinjore.
3. Ng`wono mar Nyasachwa,ng`wono mochwere;Oloso ji duto,okonyogi pile;Kik wacha Nyasachwa,to wamiye duong` chuth,En Wuon ng`wono,gi hera, gi teko.
